name: html5-youtube-everywhere
title: HTML5 YouTube Everywhere
description: Replace the old Flash based embedded YouTube videos with HTML5 iframes and force existing iframes to use the HTML5 player.
author: Riku-Pekka Silvola

preferences.name: yt-clicktoplay-ext
preferences.title: Enable click to play outside YouTube
preferences.description: Do not automatically start playing outside of YouTube

preferences.name: yt-force-iframe
preferences.title: Use iframe player in YouTube
preferences.description: Tries to replace the video player in YouTube with an HTML5 iframe. [EXPERIMENTAL]

preferences.name: yt-clicktoplay
preferences.title: Enable click to play on YouTube
preferences.description: Do not automatically start playing on YouTube
